title: Hour 3 - Deshaun Watson Watch, Arch Manning Helps Recruiting
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Deshaun Watson Watch, Arch Manning Helps Recruiting
description:
Dan resets the Deshaun Watson story prior to a possible ruling from the NFL on his discipline today, and he talks about how helpful Arch Manning's commitment to Texas has been for their recruiting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
